title: Is ARAM supposed to be too easy???
body:
I've played two games recently in ARAM, one as Teemo and one as Irelia (who was free that week)

I've only played Teemo once or twice before, around 4 or more months back

I've never played Irelia before, and I've only had one to three rounds before in my _entire history in league, and probably a majority of my experience in MOBAs_ where I've played a melee champ.

I had no idea what to do and pressed the buttons randomly whenever an enemy approached. I pretty much ended the game being fed in both matches.

Is ARAM supposed to be this easy?

replies.body: you're low levelled and playing aram. probably half of the players in the game were bots. aram just like all gamemodes have matchmaking that (attempts) to make it fair

LOL I knew they were too easy to be real people! I had NO CLUE how to use Irelia, and just spammed several times, and got more kills than almost everyone else, but there'd always be _one_ person who got 4 more kills than I did.
aram is supposed to be a muck around game mode for fun, which in no way shows your skill level
based off what you said you are lower then lvl  or are bronze, aram is mixmatched but still sort of fair.
